response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly benefit you. This product holds immense value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you might be even greater. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $900,000. I trust that this offer reflects both the value of the product and my desire to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 900000}
